vote.title: Authorize an increase in the construction services contract for a job order contract with Metco Engineering dba Metco to provide additional construction services at Willie B Johnson Recreation Center located at 12225 Willowdell Drive - Not to exceed $416,017.00, from $441,930.00 to $857,947.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
